productCartDesc: Pair of black-pottery Beer Mugs and Cups
productLongDesc: Black stone pottery- also known as Black Pottery; is prized for its unique qualities. It boasts exceptional heat retention and even distribution- making it ideal for slow cooking. Its natural minerals add flavor to food and enhance its nutritional value. Additionally- its sleek black finish adds an aesthetic touch to tableware.
productShortDesc: Pair of black-pottery Beer Mugs and Cups
productSize: Mug -Diameter: 10 cm , Height: 9cm Cup- Diameter: 8 cm , Height: 5cm
